Description.Name: Dobrev Down
Description.Details: Farah calls you to the Argo's Command Center, where you find the viewscreen overflowing with grainy Holo images and dossiers. "Multiple sources confirm that an unknown spacecraft crashed into a saltwater lake on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore],Mantharaka]] about a month ago. Her surviving crew was medevaced to an orbiting station, where they were all found to have suffered misjump-induced injuries." "That's the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDobrev],Dobrev]]!" Farah pumps her fist, her smile radiant with triumph. "It has to be!" Darius nods. "Yes, and that was the good news. The bad news is, we're not the only company on the derelict's trail. The [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBlackWidow],Black Widow]] has been carving a bloody trail across the Frontier, burning out black market sites on over a dozen worlds. And I have reliable information that she's moving toward Mantharaka." Sumire shakes her head. "If we fight the Black Widow, she's gonna end us. This is a bad idea, Commander." Farah shrugs. "So we move fast. If we recover the Dobrev's navigation logs before she gets there, we won't even need to fight."

Description.Name: Assert that if it comes to a fight, you can beat the Black Widow.
high spirits, the fans approve
Description.Details: You let your voice take on a hard edge. "I'm not afraid of Natasha Kerensky. {COMPANY.CompanyName} beat the Black Widow Company back on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAppian],Appian]]. And if it comes to a fight, I will gladly do it again." Darius crosses his arms over his chest. "The Commander is right. We can beat the Black Widow. All we need to do is be prepared." Sumire's lips tighten, but she says nothing. Eventually, she sighs. "I'll mark Mantharaka on the star map, but we'd better not go before we're ready. When I land us there, we're gonna be committed to seeing this job through to the end."

Description.Name: Reinforce Farah's message, urging speed to avoid a fight.
high spirits, fans approve
Description.Details:
You nod at Farah. "Dr. Murad is right. Like Darius said, the Black Widow is going planet to planet, destroying every black market operation the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBaumannGroup],Baumann Group]] has touched. If we move quickly enough, we can get in and out before she even shows up."

Darius nods slowly. "Sure, that could work. But once we've committed to landing on Mantharaka, we'll be stuck there until the job is done. We'd better be prepared to fight her, just in case."
